entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY ENDED, Brantford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:20 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brantford Municipal Airport 06:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
Temperature: -2.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -3.2°C
Wind: NNW 18 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
